singlish: Wah, the kopi today taste damn solid lah!

singlish: Alamak, the food delivery came late and now cold already lor.
english: Oh no, the food delivery came late and is cold already.

singlish: Wah, the buffet today got so many choices — makan like king lah.
english: Wow, the buffet today had so many choices — ate like a king.

singlish: I saw my ex at the mall, then cover eyes and walk fast one leh.
english: I saw my ex at the mall, then I covered my eyes and walked quickly.

singlish: My laptop just overheated and died during presentation, I kena sian big time.
english: My laptop overheated and died during the presentation; I got really upset.

singlish: We just sit by the pool, watch clouds pass, feel super chill lah.
english: We just sat by the pool and watched clouds pass; feel super relaxed.

singlish: She didn't pick up my calls since last week, now I feel ulu and out of place.
english: She hasn't picked up my calls since last week; now I feel lonely and out of place.

singlish: Huh? You actually transferred out of the company already meh?
english: Huh? You actually left the company already?

singlish: I takut the taxi driver zai turn wrong expressway, then we kena jam.
english: I'm afraid the taxi driver will take the wrong expressway and we will get stuck in traffic.

singlish: Just another day, wake up, go office, nothing much to shout about lah.
english: Just another day: woke up, went to office, nothing much to say.

singlish: The gym membership fee kena hike again — confirm cannot tahan.
english: The gym membership fee was increased again — definitely can't bear it.

singlish: Wah, the weekend stay-cation was power—pool, spa, views, so onz.
english: Wow, the weekend stay-cation was great—pool, spa, views, so all-in.

singlish: My project failed last night, I feel damn down lah, like wasted time.
english: My project failed last night; I feel really down, like my time was wasted.

singlish: Alamak, car park full when reach, then kena walk far in the rain.
english: Oh no, the car park was full when I arrived, then had to walk far in the rain.

singlish: The sudden fire alarm went off during movie, we all kena shock one.
english: The sudden fire alarm went off during the movie; we all got quite a shock.

singlish: I worry my dog swallow the pill by mistake — got heart palpitations leh.
english: I worry my dog will swallow the pill by mistake; got heart palpitations.

singlish: We chill downtown, kopi and prata, talk until late, everything so steady lah.
english: We chilled downtown; had coffee and prata; talked until late; everything so good.

singlish: He keep acting blur in Zoom calls, I end up doing his workload also.
english: He keeps acting clueless in Zoom calls; I end up doing his workload too.

singlish: She move to another country for studies — so proud yet feel a bit left behind lor.
english: She moved to another country to study — so proud but I feel a bit left behind.

singlish: My phone ping all night from spam calls, now cannot sleep leh.
english: My phone pinged all night from spam calls; now I can't sleep.

singlish: Okay lah, we meet around seven, coffee then procrastinate until later.
english: Alright then, we'll meet around seven; coffee then procrastinate until later.

singlish: Wah bravo! You hit the jackpot in 4D — sibeh onz leh.
english: Wow, bravo! You hit the lottery — super awesome.

singlish: The weather today change so sudden, umbrella left in car then kena downpour.
english: The weather changed so suddenly and I left my umbrella in the car then got soaked by downpour.

singlish: My phone screen crack after one week, feel sian that I just bought new one.
english: My phone screen cracked after one week; feel upset as I just bought it.

singlish: I takut I'll kena infected by virus because labs so crowded.
english: I'm afraid I'll get infected by a virus because the labs are so crowded.

singlish: The MRT crowded like sardine can again today — boh suay.
english: The train was crowded like a sardine can again today — no luck.

singlish: We attended the rooftop party, view stunning, drinks flowing — pure joy.
english: We attended the rooftop party; the view was stunning, drinks flowing — pure joy.

singlish: Boss suddenly change target, we had to scramble last minute, confirmed stressed.
english: The boss suddenly changed the target; we had to scramble last minute; definitely stressed.

singlish: After the breakup I feel lost one, cannot even recognise who I am now.
english: After the breakup I feel lost; can't even recognise who I am now.

singlish: He got bit by stray dog, then kena jip (injury) and now worry of rabies.
english: He got bitten by a stray dog; then got injured and now am worried about rabies.

singlish: We just wander Orchard Road, no plan, just absorb city vibes, very chill.
english: We just wandered Orchard Road; no plan; just absorbed city vibes; very relaxed.

singlish: Wah the cake from that patisserie damn atas and taste legendary.
english: Wow the cake from that patisserie is so high-end and tastes legendary.

singlish: Alamak, forgot my umbrella and the sun burn me till I blistered.
english: Oh no, forgot my umbrella and got sun-burnt until I blistered.

singlish: They upgraded system overnight without notice, now all workflow mess up, sian max.
english: They upgraded the system overnight without notice; now all workflow messed up; very frustrated.

singlish: The charity event got huge turnout, so surprise to see all age groups come.
english: The charity event had a huge turnout; very surprising to see all age groups come.

singlish: I'm takut heights, the rooftop edge made me knees weak leh.
english: I'm afraid of heights; the rooftop edge made my knees weak.

singlish: Just normal dinner at home, nothing fancy but feel content lah.
english: Just a normal dinner at home; nothing fancy but feel content.

singlish: Wah, we got front-row seats at concert last night — totally onz.
english: Wow, we got front-row seats at the concert last night — totally enthusiastic.

singlish: He keep pretending to work but actually TikTok all day, I kena angsty.
english: He keeps pretending to work but actually TikToking all day; I'm annoyed.

singlish: My friend move away, I'll miss all the mischief we used to do — so down.
english: My friend moved away; I'll miss all the mischief we used to do — feel so sad.

singlish: I heard footsteps at the back door in the dead of night, confirm kena scare.
english: I heard footsteps at the back door late at night; definitely got scared.

singlish: We arranged surprise party for her, she kena shock and cried happily.
english: We arranged a surprise party for her; she got shocked and cried happily.

singlish: Traffic light changed too fast, the car in front braked hard — almost crash lor.
english: The traffic light changed too fast; the car in front braked hard — almost crashed.

singlish: My team won inter-company hackathon, we all pumped up sia.
english: My team won the inter-company hackathon; we're all pumped up.

singlish: The housing loan rate increased again, now many cousins kena stress.
english: The housing loan rate increased again; now many cousins are stressed.

singlish: The sudden blackout in the estate last night, children cried and dogs barked, so creepy.
english: The sudden blackout in the estate last night; children cried and dogs barked; so creepy.

singlish: We just met for kopi, talk until midnight, simple yet nice lah.
english: We just met for coffee; talked until midnight; simple yet nice.

singlish: She outdid herself in the performance, crowd gave standing ovation — proud moment.
english: She outdid herself in the performance; crowd gave standing ovation — proud moment.

singlish: My car GPS lost signal in tunnel, I kena lost and panic for minutes.
english: My car GPS lost signal in the tunnel; I got lost and panicked for minutes.

singlish: He ghosted meeting without notice, team angry and morale dropped.
english: He skipped the meeting without notice; team is angry and morale dropped.

singlish: This quiet Sunday afternoon, I sip kopi-o, watch rain, just content one lah.
english: This quiet Sunday afternoon; I'm sipping kopi-o, watching rain; just content.

singlish: Wah, the new hawker stall just open, queue already until kacang puteh long one.
english: Wow, the new hawker stall just opened, the queue is already super long.

singlish: I kena kena double-book meeting today, whole morning gone sia.
english: I got double—booked meetings today; the whole morning is gone.

singlish: Just chill at home with Netflix and kopi, nothing much but feel content lah.
english: Just relaxing at home with Netflix and coffee; nothing much but I feel content.

singlish: Alamak, my flight got cancelled last min, now stuck at Changi.
english: Oh no, my flight got cancelled at the last minute; now I'm stuck at Changi Airport.

singlish: I takut taxi uncle drive like zai, I hold on tight leh.
english: I'm afraid the taxi driver drives recklessly; I hold on tight.

singlish: Got lobang for free workshop tomorrow, must attend lah.
english: Got an opportunity for a free workshop tomorrow; must attend.

singlish: He never reply my WhatsApp after our chat, now I feel quite ulu.
english: He never replied to my WhatsApp after our chat; now I feel quite isolated.

singlish: Today weather so hot, sweat already before lunchtime lor.
english: Today the weather is so hot; I was sweating before lunchtime.

singlish: Wah lau, the makan place confirm atas but price also atas one.
english: Wow, the restaurant is definitely high-end but the price is also high.

singlish: We thought the movie will be shiok, but ended up quite meh.
english: We thought the movie would be great, but it ended up quite average.

singlish: I worry the report missing some data; boss will sure kena ang moh one.
english: I worry the report is missing some data; the boss will surely get angry.

singlish: Lepak with old friends at kopitiam, talk until late, feel very steady lah.
english: Hanging out with old friends at the coffee shop, talked until late; felt really good.

singlish: The app crashed during my payment, then I kena sian finding support.
english: The app crashed during my payment; then I had to go through frustrating support.

singlish: Huh? You already move house? Didn't even tell me one leh.
english: Huh? You already moved house? Didn't even tell me.

singlish: My bike tyre flat in the ulu area, then I wait so long for help.
english: My bike tyre went flat in a remote area; then I waited so long for help.

singlish: Yi-lo, this deal too good to be true — must double check lah.
english: Wow, this deal is too good to be true — must double check.

singlish: We won the internal quiz today, everyone cheer like crazy sia!
english: We won the internal quiz today; everyone cheered like crazy!

singlish: The new system update caused so many bugs, confirm team kena sian.
english: The new system update caused so many bugs; definitely the team is frustrated.

singlish: I nearly miss the bus, bus door about to close, kena heart-attack moment.
english: I nearly missed the bus; the bus door was about to close; had a heart-attack moment.

singlish: She found old letters from him, then feel quite nostalgic lah.
english: She found old letters from him; then feels quite nostalgic.

singlish: Okay lah, we just walk around Marina Bay, enjoy view, nothing grand.
english: Alright, let's just walk around Marina Bay, enjoy the view; nothing grand.

singlish: Wah, the cupcake so cute and taste damn good, must go again.
english: Wow, the cupcake is so cute and tastes really good; must return again.

singlish: My phone glitched mid-video call, boss scold me until I feel so sad.
english: My phone glitched in the middle of a video call, and the boss scolded me — I feel really sad.

singlish: Alamak, the weather shift so fast, umbrella left in car again.
english: Oh no, the weather changed so fast; I left my umbrella in the car again.

singlish: He keeps taking credit for my work, I cannot tahan this privilage already.
english: He keeps taking credit for my work; I cannot tolerate this anymore.

singlish: Going stay-cation tomorrow, so ready to switch off and relax lah.
english: Going on a stay-cation tomorrow; ready to switch off and relax.

singlish: My laptop memory full, keep warning pop-up now, feel sian.
english: My laptop memory is full; warning popups keep appearing; I feel frustrated.

singlish: I'm scared the exam hall will turn into zoo again, cannot concentrate leh.
english: I'm afraid the exam hall will become chaotic again; can't concentrate.

singlish: Just normal jog around neighbourhood, air fresh, mind clear one.
english: Just a normal jog around the neighbourhood; air is fresh; mind is clear.

singlish: Wah, the band live performance last night damn shiok lah.
english: Wow, the band's live performance last night was really good.

singlish: My refund got delayed, customer service play backyard pok pok, so angsty.
english: My refund got delayed; customer service playing backyard steps; so frustrated.

singlish: She moved out without telling, I felt abandoned and down lah.
english: She moved out without telling; I felt abandoned and down.

singlish: I saw strange shadow by stairs, then heart jump one leh.
english: I saw a strange shadow by the stairs; then my heart jumped.

singlish: We just pop by hawker centre, makan char kway teow, no fuss but satisfy.
english: We just popped by the hawker centre; ate char kway teow; no fuss but was satisfying.

singlish: The surprise party they threw for me damn atas, I feel so touched.
english: The surprise party they organised for me was really high-class; I feel so touched.

singlish: Huh? You guys finish without me? I thought we started together lah.
english: Huh? You guys finished without me? I thought we were starting together.

singlish: Boss say he cut bonus this year, then gloom settle over everyone.
english: The boss said he's cutting bonuses this year; then gloom settled over everyone.

singlish: I worry this storm will knock out power, candles must standby leh.
english: I'm worried this storm will knock out power; must keep candles ready.

singlish: Okay lah, done for the day, go home and chillax.
english: Alright, done for the day; go home and chill.

singlish: Wah, my kid scored A for exam, I damn proud lah.
english: Wow, my child scored an A in the exam; I'm really proud.

singlish: The event location changed last minute, then we scramble and still late.
english: The event location changed at the last minute; then we scrambled and were still late.

singlish: I feel like walking through history at Fort Canning, quite introspective leh.
english: I feel like walking through history at Fort Canning; quite introspective.

singlish: My car alarm started beeping at 3 am, then I wake up in panic.
english: My car alarm started beeping at 3 am; I woke up in panic.

singlish: Let's just makan supper, talk until late, then tomorrow worry about it lah.
english: Let's just eat supper, talk until late; then we'll worry about it tomorrow.

singlish: Wah, the fireworks finale blew my mind, totally surprise and wow.
english: Wow, the fireworks finale blew my mind; totally surprising and wow.

singlish: We finally settle the renovation, house look so neat now — raining praise.
english: We finally finished the renovation; house looks so neat now — getting lots of praise.

singlish: My flight delay plus baggage lost, worst travel day ever lah.
english: My flight was delayed plus my baggage got lost; worst travel day ever.

singlish: I fear my tastebuds gone jaded after eating same hawker food every week.
english: I fear my taste buds have gone dull after eating the same hawker food every week.

singlish: The neighbour's dog bark all night, then I kena zombie mode next day.
english: The neighbour's dog barked all night; then I got into zombie mode the next day.

singlish: Just lie down and stare at ceiling, brain full of ideas but lazy to move lah.
english: Just lie down and stare at the ceiling; brain full of ideas but too lazy to move.
